name: Bididhayi
description: A now-peaceful theocracy that has benefited greatly from their warlike Chobesh neighbors' collapse.

name: Cheuritae
description: A conglomerate of various island groups that sends privateers to raid other nations' ships.

name: Chobesh
description: A formerly-powerful kingdom that lost it all after a century at war with its neighbors, and lies in ruin.

name: Elethian
description: The unified nation of elves; these long-lived people have little interest in short-term power grabs.

name: Hidzaajji
description: A desert nation that has built up strength through alliances and trade; they compete with Geuhwae.

name: Hueztotli
description: A nation that has somehow survived despite being based in a jungle with terrifyingly-strong monsters.

name: Hyrden
description: An alliance of a church and a kingdom; they routinely crusade against undead in the West Bowl.

name: Ikkutiq
description: A magically-formidable utopia that thrives deep in the dangerous Bowl using their arcane barriers.

name: Jalgeaux
description: A potent nation where the sizable aristocratic class manipulates the lower classes away from revolt.

name: Geuhwae
description: A massive empire that formed from the merger of various rival states; it is an economic titan.

name: Khainghal
description: A nomadic group that moves between dodging monsters near Hueztotli and raiding Geuhwae.

name: Krort
description: A grouping of similar Orc tribes that, unable to easily raid Ikkutiq, have settled down to learn magic.

name: Laathrik
description: A group of Kobold clans that tunnel under undead palaces to raid them of their riches.

name: Mbegonda
description: A group of nations across a wide area that speak a common language, but don't share a government.

name: Mobyuld
description: An attempt at a Goblin nation, modeled after Ugexiir, that wants to be a dominant force in the Bowl.

name: Ninja
description: A rebel state that has split off of Otekai, and has been embroiled in that civil war for centuries.

name: Otekai
description: An honor-driven nation that refuses to admit surrender or sign a treaty in their war against the Ninja.

name: Ugexiir
description: A land that has driven off many Goblin invasions, and watches with curiosity as Mobyuld forms.

name: Zedmedov
description: A grim nation that has the misfortune of being located closest to the undead-infested West Bowl.

name: Nuruk
description: A fallen empire of necromancers overthrown by their undead minions; the walking dead own this land.
